name: Quoteability
author: Ben Marshall

sections.description:
Use the following shortcode to include shareable quotes:

[quoteability]I love the Quoteability WordPress plugin! -Ben Marshall[/quoteability]

Available options:

  • via – Adds @VIA to quote.
  • button – Share link text (defaults to ‘Tweet This Quote’)
  • class – Class for blockquote
  • override – Quote text (defaults to the text within the shortcode)
  • url – URL to share (defaults to current url)
  • target – Defaults to ‘_blank’

Languages: English

If you have suggestions for a new add-on, feel free to email me at me@benmarshall.me. Want regular updates? Follow me on Twitter or visit my blog.

Contributors

  • Ben Marshall
sections.installation:
Plugin Installation

  1. Upload the quoteability folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Override bug fix

1.0.2

  • Plugin name updates.

1.0.1

  • Minor bug fixes.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: A simple, light-weight WordPress plugin that allows you to easily add shareable quotes via shortcodes.
